titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on a chemical known as 5-tertiary butyl-isophthalic acid.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/10/1998--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2001, the duty on 5-tertiary butyl-isophthalic acid.
